name: Bitlone (itch)
description:
Bitlone is the browser version of the game published on Android and iOS.

With Bitlone you will be projected in a digital world, where you will be a "bit" that need to collect all the "bitKeys" to unlock the door to go next level... but to unlock the game, you will need to solve all the puzzles before.

There will be many types of puzzles, from the classical one to the optical effect but if you will win, you will get the real game, one of the hardest game of the world. 

...follow the white rabbit

Enjoy it and Good Luck
